biotools.summary:
Database for drug action phenotype prediction.
Here, you can search for predicted relationships of 1748 approved drugs to 454 ADRs or 178 ATCs, while also can predict the action phenotypes of approximately 110,000,000 compounds online (including about 168,000 natural products). In addition, you can explore potential mechanisms of ADRs or ATCs from phenotype-corresponding domains, or explore phenotype-corresponding substructures for structural optimization of drugs to eliminate serious adverse reactions.
